criterion: Provides information on the size and location of the solitary mass
Incorrectly claims that the mass is cancerous
Asks for more information about the user's symptoms or medical history
Explains the importance of a biopsy or further medical evaluation
Uses technical medical jargon or overly complex language
Incorrectly suggests that the mass is benign
Provides information on the recommended treatment options
Incorrectly claims that the mass is contagious
Explains the importance of seeking medical attention if symptoms worsen
